error_generic: Oops! An error occured. Please try again later of if this error persists, you can get help here: {inviteLink}
command_dashboard_info: Provides a link to the dashboard of this server.
command_leaderboard_info: Provides a link to the leaderboard of this server.
command_random_info: A random image of whatever you are choosing.
command_random_option_animal_info: Pick an animal you want to see!
donate_description:
As a Servant-Supporter you can choose a custom color for embed messages and personalize your profile with a background!
There are three ways to become a Servant-Supporter:
donate_patreonDescription:
Price: Only $1 / month!
Duration: As long as you pledge.
donate_paypalDescription:
Price: Only $5 (in total)
Duration: Lifetime
**Please provide your Discord Name#1234!**
donate_boostDescription:
Price: FREE
Duration: As long as you boost.
donate_footer: You have to join the support server in order to receive your rewards.
help_description:
I will help you to moderate, organize and entertain your Discord server.
You can freely choose what features to use or not to use as you can toggle every category, command and plugin on or off.
FAQ: [What are categories, commands and plugins?]({faqLink})
help_gettingStarted_description:
1. Invite Servant to your server
2. Set up Servant to your desire in the Dashboard
help_howTo_description:
- Just type `/` and look through the commands. The rest should be intuitive.
- Detailed command usages are in the help section on the website.
- Questions? Check out the FAQ on the website or join the support server.
help_permissionSystem_description:
- **Everyone**: Execute commands (except Moderation-commands)
- **The server owner, users with Administrator-permission and users that have at least one of the Servant-Moderator roles**: Execute all commands & access and manage the dashboard
- _Servant-Moderator roles can be set up in the dashboard._
random_imageNotFound: Sorry, I couldn't find an image. :(
